CustomField.formula: IF(OR( breadwinner_qbo__Type__c=='Credit Memo',breadwinner_qbo__Type__c=='Refund Receipt'),breadwinner_qbo__Credit_Memo_Total_Amount__c-breadwinner_qbo__Total_Tax__c-breadwinner_qbo__Shipping_Charges__c,breadwinner_qbo__Total__c + breadwinner_qbo__Discount_Amount__c - breadwinner_qbo__Total_Tax__c - breadwinner_qbo__Shipping_Charges__c)
CustomField.label: Sub Total
